Key Match Events: Nick Castellanos homered in his first at bat
Nick Castellanos drew a two-out walk and scored the winning run
Nick Castellanos made a lunging catch in right field to prevent the tying run
Nick Castellanos was plunked again in the bottom of the eighth
Weston Wilson drove in the game-winning run
Aramis Ramirez made key defensive plays, including throwing out a tying run
Post-Match Reflections: The Phillies trimmed their magic number to win their first NL East crown since 2011
The win was a pivotal moment in their playoff push
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kevin Cash's suspension for intentionally throwing at Castellanos
